history.proof: intros d sigma Href Hcorrect. unfold DTA_ref_ok, DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. destruct d as [p a]. hauto lq: on use: DTA_kill_ref_ok_invar, dta_states_non_empty_lazy_eg_dta_states_non_empty unfold: DTA_ref_ok inv: DTA.

original: intros d sigma Href Hcorrect. unfold DTA_ref_ok, DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. destruct d as [p a]. simpl. apply DTA_kill_ref_ok_invar. - apply Href. - apply Hcorrect.
